0xF91DF93B.name: TASK_GO_TO_COORD_ANY_MEANS

params.name: vehicle
params.description: If defined, the pedestrian will only move if said vehicle exists. If you don't want any sort of association, just set it to `0`.

params.name: bUseLongRangeVehiclePathing
params.description: Setting to `true` tells the vehicle to use longrange vehicle pathing.

params.name: fMaxRangeToShootTargets
params.description: Determines the maximum distance at which the `Ped` will engage in combat with threatening targets.
